intro: Litosanthes novoguineensis, commonly known as the New Guinea litosanthes, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of New Guinea. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow in color. Its leaves are simple, opposite, and often have a slightly hairy texture. Litosanthes novoguineensis is adapted to grow in moist, shaded environments, often found in forest understories.
